Text:
I can't believe they remade this crap movie. The original with Omar Sharif was horrid enough.
The endless riding across the tundra in search of illicit tail was enough to make me puke!!!
Please could you rip the subtitle? There is no one available on line. Thanks
Actually it's the edition from "The Mail" and has no subs. Sorry.

@ ShinobiWaNeko

WTH?

You didn't like the first one so you take time to grab the remake just so you can bash it...

Must be nice to have that kind of free time.
